document_data.name: Belmin Gergas
document_data.mainbody:
'''Belmin Gergas''' was an inhabitant of the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]], in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Everything that has gone wrong these days is because of those vile [[elves]]... they are the plague of the world, I tell you!''|Belmin Gergas}}
document_data.Description: Belmin was a gray-haired man who harbored hatred for elves and a mere sight of [[drow]] filled him with violent vitriol.
document_data.History: Belmin Gergas frequented the the grand market in Athkatla's [[Athkatla/Center District|Center District]] â€“ [[Waukeen's Promenade]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}. He could be found ranting about the evils of elves by a decorative fountain outside the Promenade, blaming all the recent strive on the Fair Folk. He did not hesitate to verbally assault elven and [[half-elven]] men an women who crossed his path and physically assaulted any drow he encountered.
